text:
Do you have a tutorial video of fetch and upload?
Ftp was easy. I am not familiar yet with HubSpot cli
There’s some video content in the HubSpot Academy quickstart course: <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/2359864/lessons/673/3416>

Other than that, I don’t believe we have video content on that specifically. Is there something specific you’re looking for outside of the content covered in the getting started doc (see below)?

<https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-local-development>
Anyone know why `hs watch` might not be uploading new assets on save? I'm on the current release.
<@U22VBL87M> This fixed my issues with global content. Guess something in our boilerplate messed with the link between the local module and the live module.
